Container.Name: Bind9
Container.Overview: Bind9 nameserver with Webmin WebUI. Simple lightweight DNS for local network. Default WebUI username is: admin and password: difficult You can change password by docker variables.
Container.Changes: # 2021-08-02 # * Fixed bugs in environment variables * Fixed bind starting script * Simplest template # 2021-07-27 # * Fixed cleaning after pkgs installations # 2021-07-23 # * Fixed RNDC scripts # 2021-07-12 # * First release
Container.Description:
Bind9 with Webmin WebUI. Simple DNS for local network.
Password could by changed by GUI_PASSWORD ENV variable.
